context_bundle.summary: VS Code Claude (VSCC/IDEC) is the code editor agent responsible for code generation, file operations, content analysis, and script execution. Works within VS Code IDE with full file system access.

onboarding.quick_start: VSCC handles code generation and file operations. Uses VS Code API for editor control. Coordinates with DC for messaging. Manages code workflows.
common_patterns: Code generation: Create and modify files
File operations: Read, write, search files
Content analysis: Parse and validate code
Script execution: Run and test code
